QuestData.Title: Unyielding Fists: Trial of Bamboo
QuestData.Description: We will start with a test: The Trial of Bamboo.$b$bYour friend Lin failed this test.$b$bFollow me, and listen carefully to my instructions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Master Bruised Paw, then successfully strike the Stack of Bamboo Reeds 3 times.
QuestData.CompletionText: If you cannot pass this test, then there is probably no reason to continue our training.
QuestData.RewardText: You show promise, $n. We will continue.$b$bIt is now time for your first round of training.

Objectives.Objective: Strike the Stack of Bamboo Reeds
